name: Neo Street Sweeper 2039
description:
A (very) small GB Studio game/PoC. Clean up the street while avoiding the unruly mobs of Beta City.

Controls
  • Up - Up Arrow / W
  • Down - Down Arrow / S
  • Left - Left Arrow / A
  • Right - Right Arrow / D
  • Sweep - Alt / Z / J
  • Start - Enter
Credits

Built with GB Studio: https://chrismaltby.itch.io/gb-studio

Music

From GB Studio community assets here: https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets/tree/master/Music#credits

  • krümel (crumb)#0723
  • Ember#1765 / DeerTears
Sprites

Backgrounds built with https://beachboogeyman.itch.io/technogothic-tileset-gb-studio
